PerfectNetExp.abs: 另一些属迄今为止还无杂交的报道，如奇唇兰属(Stanhopea)。奇唇兰属的花是自然界最复杂的花。
奇唇兰(stanhopea)May 24 Thu 2012 21:04 石斛兰之一种 May 12 Sat 2012 21:08 种在树上的蝴蝶兰 Apr 23 Mon 2012 19:56 瀑布兰

means.word_mean: 1. any of various orchids of the genus Stanhopea having a single large leaf and loose racemes of large fragrant flowers of various colors; Mexico to Brazil
